page.title: 13Goffs Oak Farms,Nurseries
page.content: Most of the farms in this area are small dairy farms.They vary in size, one of the larger being Burnt Farm which is 300 acres.It has a barn which is over 300 years old and is also a listed building.Because most of the farms are small they employ very few people.Most of the workers seem to be the families of the farmers. There are also many nurseries and market gardens here.One of the nurseries is "East View".It sells a variety of plants and vegetables in large quantities to shops and markets. "Brynfields",a garden centre, grows and sells to the public,unlike "East View". Some market gardens grow just a few varieties of crops in large amounts to sell to markets.Even though it seems we live out in the country we are only 12.25 miles from central London.
